layer_1_agent_self_validation.description: Each implementing agent must provide evidence packages
requirements: Evidence Package: JSON file with timestamped proof
Before/After Comparison: Screenshots or data showing changes
Reproducible Commands: Exact commands others can run to verify
Error Logs: Any failures encountered during implementation

layer_2_peer_cross_validation.description: Different agent reviews implementing agent's work

layer_3_independent_fraud_detection.description: Final reviewing agent with fraud detection mandate
requirements: Evidence Authenticity Check: Verify timestamps, file sizes, logical consistency
Functional Verification: Test all claimed functionality independently
Completion Criteria Validation: Ensure all requirements actually met
REJECT AUTHORITY: Must reject completion if any evidence appears fabricated

evidence_standards.timestamp_consistency: All evidence must have consistent, logical timestamps
evidence_standards.file_integrity: File sizes and checksums must match claimed modifications
evidence_standards.reproducibility: Commands must produce identical results when re-run
evidence_standards.specificity: Must include exact file paths, URLs, container IDs, command outputs

fraud_detection_triggers: File modifications without corresponding git changes
Claims that cannot be independently reproduced
Theoretical analysis presented as real testing
Missing concrete evidence for major claims
Evidence that appears fabricated or doctored

escalation_procedures.investigation_protocol: Independent verification by fraud detection agent
escalation_procedures.rejection_authority: Final reviewer can reject any false completion claims

tdd_expert.role: Write failing tests first, drive implementation
tdd_expert.evidence_requirement: Test files, test output, implementation driven by tests

implementation_specialist.evidence_requirement: Working code, before/after comparisons, functionality proof

system_architect.validation_focus: System design, integration patterns, architecture compliance

production_validator.role: Verify functionality in real production environment
production_validator.validation_focus: Live system testing, production readiness, real environment proof

independent_reviewer.role: Final validation gatekeeper with rejection authority
independent_reviewer.validation_focus: Evidence authenticity, functional verification, fraud prevention

cascade_workflow: 1. Implementing agent creates evidence package with timestamped proof
2. Peer agent independently verifies evidence and tests functionality
3. Fraud detection agent performs final authenticity and functional checks
4. Only work that passes all 3 layers is marked complete
5. Any layer can trigger rejection and require re-implementation

success_criteria.layer_1_pass: Agent provides complete evidence package with reproducible proof
success_criteria.layer_2_pass: Independent agent successfully reproduces all claimed functionality
success_criteria.layer_3_pass: Fraud detection agent confirms evidence authenticity and functional completion
success_criteria.overall_completion: All 3 layers must pass for task to be marked complete
